name: Youth & Student Organizing
description: Through youth organizing, CPA develops the leadership of working-class Chinese American and Asian American youth to organize for change in their communities. Our programs include: - Youth MOJO (Movement of Justice and Organizing) for Chinese and Asian American high school youth to take action on social issues - Enoki Collective, formerly known as the Gender & Sexuality Diversities (GSD), for young women, femmes, TGNC youth to have a safe space to explore their gender and sexuality - Common Roots

howToGetIt: Please visit the CPA website or reach out to (415) 391-6986 for more information.
